ru.cos.sim.driver.composite.cases.utils
Class IDMCalculator

java.lang.Object
  ru.cos.sim.driver.composite.cases.utils.IDMCalculator

public class IDMCalculator
extends Object

Calculation of acceleration according to IDM model. http://www.vwi.tu-dresden.de/~treiber/MicroApplet/IDM.html

Author:
zroslaw
